table.name: clusternode
table.description: This table holds properties for each node in the cluster

column.name: nodeaddress
column.description: The ip address of this node

column.name: nodeurl
column.description: The URL where the managing instance of this node can be reached

column.name: lastupdate
column.description: This enables to clean the table in case of a crash

column.name: masternode
column.description: If this is the master node, this value is > 0

column.name: reloadconfig
column.description: If this is not 0, reload the configuration from TSITE

column.name: moreprops
column.description: This is a multi-purpose field. It contains a text in .properties format with a number of additional attributes.

table.name: tacl
table.description: Describes which person has which role in which project.

column.name: refreshconfiguration
column.description: In case of configuration change, this is set to the number of nodes. As each node updates its configuration, the count is decremented.

column.name: firsttime
column.description: When this is the first start after a version upgrade, go to site configuration

column.name: moreprops
column.description: This is a multi-purpose field. It contains a text in .properties format with a number of additional attributes.

table.name: tbaseline
table.description: For each workitem this table contains the history of start and due dates.

column.name: moreprops
column.description: This is a multi-purpose field. It contains a text in .properties format with a number of additional attributes.

column.name: label
column.description: The name of this issue type. Localization will be applied if possible by the business logic.

column.name: symbol
column.description: File name for a small graphical symbol (GIF or PNG)

table.name: tclass
table.description: A class is just a special project specific list field, e.g. for categorizing issues further into documentation related issues, hardware related issues, etc.

column.name: moreprops
column.description: This is a multi-purpose field. It contains a text in .properties format with a number of additional attributes.

column.name: moreprops
column.description: This is a multi-purpose field. It contains a text in .properties format with a number of additional attributes.

table.name: tdepartment
table.description: This table holds the departments. Each user belongs to one department.

table.name: tentitychanges
table.description: This table holds the changed entities for updating the full text search index in each clusternode

column.name: moreprops
column.description: This is a multi-purpose field. It contains a text in .properties format with a number of additional attributes.

column.name: objectid
column.description: This helps with the bookkeeping of logged in users

column.name: nodeaddress
column.description: The ip address of the node which counts these numbers

column.name: sessionid
column.description: The session id under which this user was logged

column.name: loggeduser
column.description: Foreign key reference to TPERSON

column.name: userlevel
column.description: Indicates a full or limited user

column.name: lastupdate
column.description: This enables to clean the table in case of a crash

column.name: moreprops
column.description: This is a multi-purpose field. It contains a text in .properties format with a number of additional attributes.

column.name: pkey
column.description: This table holds the notification configuration for each user.

column.name: projcatkey
column.description: Notify me only for this project component (category).

column.name: statekey
column.description: Notify me only for these statuses.

column.name: workitem
column.description: If this is null, this pertains to the regular watch list, otherwise it pertains to this specific WORKITEM.

column.name: racirole
column.description: Abbreviation for RACI roles of (C)onsulted or (I)nformed

table.name: toutlinetemplate
table.description: Holds the association between the entity and the outline template

table.name: toutlinetemplatedef
table.description: defines the parts of an outline code

table.name: tperson
table.description: This table holds all user related information, like user name, e-mail, etc.

column.name: preferences
column.description: This is a multi-purpose field. It contains a text in .properties format with a number of additional attributes.

column.name: isgroup
column.description: Groups are treated like users in most cases.

column.name: userlevel
column.description: The user capability level, e.g. full user, limited user, sysadmin, sysman

column.name: symbol
column.description: File name for a small graphical symbol (GIF or PNG)

column.name: moreprops
column.description: This is a multi-purpose field. It contains a text in .properties format with a number of additional attributes.

column.name: moreprops
column.description: This is a multi-purpose field. It contains a text in .properties format with a number of additional attributes.

column.name: moreprops
column.description: This is a multi-purpose field. It contains a text in .properties format with a number of additional attributes.

column.name: fieldtype
column.description: show or grouping

column.name: expanding
column.description: used only for grouping fields

column.name: layoutkey
column.description: report overview, issue overview history/comment/attachment/worlog/watchers/version... etc.

table.name: trevision
table.description: Comments from the version control system

table.name: trevisionworkitems
table.description: Comments from the version control system

column.name: symbol
column.description: File name for a small graphical symbol (GIF or PNG)

column.name: preferences
column.description: This is a multi-purpose field. It contains a text in .properties format with a number of additional attributes.

column.name: symbol
column.description: File name for a small graphical symbol (GIF or PNG)

table.name: tsummarymail
table.description: This table holds the summary mail parts before they are sent

column.name: symbol
column.description: File name for a small graphical symbol (GIF or PNG)

table.name: ttemplateperson
table.description: The persons who can or can not run a report template

column.name: rightflag
column.description: whether the right is added or revoked
